conclusion: Preliminary objection rejected (non-exhaustion of domestic remedies);Preliminary objection rejected (victim);Violation of Art. 5-3;Violation of Art. 5-4;No violation of Art. 5-1;No violation of Art. 14+5;Not necessary to examine Art. 13 and 18;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
